import{useState,useEffect}from'react';export const useFilter=function(items){let initialFilter=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'all';const[activeFilter,setActiveFilter]=useState(initialFilter);const[filteredItems,setFilteredItems]=useState(items);useEffect(()=>{if(activeFilter==='all'){setFilteredItems(items);}else{setFilteredItems(items.filter(item=>{const categories=item.category||item.categories||'';// Split by comma and check if any category matches
const categoryArray=categories.split(',').map(c=>c.trim());return categoryArray.includes(activeFilter);}));}},[activeFilter,items]);return{activeFilter,setActiveFilter,filteredItems};};
